title: Single Cozy Room for Rent!
posting_body: - Shared kitchen, with a fridge, stove, microwave, and many cabinets for storage
- Large shared living room with plenty of daylight
- Right on the M-Line, perfect for people who don't mind the noise
- About 10 minutes away from SFSU by public transit
- Utilities (electricity, water, waste, internet) provided, but not included in rent (~$100/month)
- Nearby laundromat, right down the street
If you're interested, please email me with "Broad" somewhere in the title or body.
Include in your email a bit about yourself.
Please have your credit score and any references available.
Let me know a time we can show you the place, preferably around 10am any weekday or weekend!
